Package be.kdg.persist

Interface SailboatDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
SailboatDbDao
public interface SailboatDao
This interface defines the methods for interacting with the database for Sailboat objects. It includes methods for inserting, deleting, updating, retrieving, and sorting Sailboat objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    delete(String naam)
    Deletes a Sailboat object from the database.

    insert(Sailboat sailboat)
    Inserts a Sailboat object into the database.
    Sailboat
    retrieve(String naam)
    Retrieves a Sailboat object from the database.
    List<Sailboat>
    sortedOn(String query)
    Returns a list of Sailboat objects sorted based on a given query.

    update(Sailboat sailboat)
    Updates a Sailboat object in the database.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      boolean insert(Sailboat sailboat)
      Inserts a Sailboat object into the database.
      Parameters:
      sailboat - the Sailboat object to be inserted
      Returns:
      true if the Sailboat object was inserted successfully, false otherwise

    • delete

      boolean delete(String naam)
      Deletes a Sailboat object from the database.
      Parameters:
      naam - the name of the Sailboat object to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the Sailboat object was deleted successfully, false otherwise

    • update

      boolean update(Sailboat sailboat)
      Updates a Sailboat object in the database.
      Parameters:
      sailboat - the Sailboat object to be updated
      Returns:
      true if the Sailboat object was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • retrieve

      Sailboat retrieve(String naam)
      Retrieves a Sailboat object from the database.
      Parameters:
      naam - the name of the Sailboat object to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the Sailboat object if found, null otherwise

    • sortedOn

      List<Sailboat> sortedOn(String query)
      Returns a list of Sailboat objects sorted based on a given query.
      Parameters:
      query - the query to be used for sorting
      Returns:
      a list of sorted Sailboat objects
